name: Terro bot
description:
Hello there, my name is doruk but pelase call me droper or droper2714.i am not a professional coder but i am expirenced
Terro Bot(also known as terro ant) was my first succsefull project
this game has some special things like:
-auto aim
-stupid guns
-co-op split screen
-community maps
and more silly things
anyways you can try the demo and chose yo uwant to buy it or not sorry for now you can't but it but please be
patient i am a one man army
